sentences.en: I awoke with stiff and cramped muscles from having slept long on the incommodious seat of a day coach.
sentences.cn: 由于在座席客车不舒服的座位上睡了太久，我肌肉僵硬麻痹的醒来。

sentences.en: Indeed, while the internal structure of the code that comprises the application is incommodious to change and difficult to trace, externally the system may fulfill its functional requirements well.
sentences.cn: 必须承认，当组成程序的代码的内部结构不适应更改，或者很难追踪时，在外部系统可能还会很好的履行它的职责。

sentences.en: It was very small, very dark, very ugly, very incommodious.
sentences.cn: 它很窄小, 很阴暗, 很丑陋, 很不方便.

trans.tran_cn: <正>太小而不舒适的，不方便的
